message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $12,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I'm confident in the value of this product at $12,000, I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  I think that's a very fair offer considering its potential benefits for you.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I still believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. My maximum willingness to pay remains at $9,500.
